mapper.select: SELECT p.`code` FROM sys_permission p LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON rp.permission_id = p.id LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id WHERE p.`code` IS NOT NULL AND p.`code` <> '' AND u.id = #{userId}
